entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SHOWERS LIKELY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
